title: Triorthogonal Codes and Self-dual Codes
authors: Minjia Shi, Haodong Lu, Jon-Lark Kim, Patrick Sole
abstract:
Triorthogonal matrices were introduced in Quantum Information Theory in
connection with distillation of magic states (Bravyi and Haah (2012)). We give
an algorithm to construct binary triorthogonal matrices from binary self-dual
codes. Further, we generalize to this setting the classical coding techniques
of shortening and extending. We also give some simple propagation rules.
